name: Crunchy Egg Salad
author: Deb
summary: If you are looking for a quick, yet very tasty egg salad recipe - look no further.  May your taste buds do the tango.
ingredients: 1 (4 ounce) can sliced water chestnuts, drained and chopped
directions: Place the eggs into a saucepan in a single layer and fill with water to cover the eggs by 1 inch
Cover the saucepan and bring the water to a boil over high heat
Once the water is boiling, remove from the heat and let the eggs stand in the hot water for 15 minutes
Cool the eggs under cold running water
Combine eggs, water chestnuts, mayonnaise, pickle relish, dry mustard, and paprika in a large bowl
Season to taste with salt and pepper
